name: Tides Of Chaos
description:
Team Members & Roles:

Nour Hamade - Map design & audio

Justin Kephart - Programming & Design

Lydia Qiao - Programming

Parker Levin - Programming

Gabriel Eck - Design & UI

Objective:

Capture the flag - Take the enemy flag and bring it back to your team's base

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aim

Left Mouse Button - Fire

Spacebar - Jump

Escape - Menu

T - Change Team

H - Change Character

Credits:

Paragon - Models and animations

Kakky - FX
